short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weatherwise is a browser extension that provides real-time weather information for any location worldwide.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weatherwise is a browser extension that provides real-time weather information for any location worldwide. It allows users to search for and view current weather conditions, hourly and daily forecasts, and weather alerts for their desired location. The extension also features customizable settings, such as temperature units and background images, to enhance the user experience. Weatherwise is a useful tool for anyone who wants to stay informed about weather conditions and plan their activities accordingly.
